name: gdrive
description: Google Drive integration for managing files and folders
author: ModuleX

setup_environment_variables.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID
setup_environment_variables.description: Google OAuth2 Client ID from Google Cloud Console (shared for Gmail and Google Drive)

setup_environment_variables.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET
setup_environment_variables.description: Google OAuth2 Client Secret from Google Cloud Console (shared for Gmail and Google Drive)

actions.name: search_files
actions.description: Search for files in Google Drive

page_size.description: Maximum number of files to return

actions.name: get_file
actions.description: Get file content and metadata by file ID

actions.name: list_files
actions.description: List files in Google Drive with optional filters

folder_id.description: Folder ID to list files from (optional)

page_size.description: Maximum number of files to return

actions.name: get_file_metadata
actions.description: Get detailed metadata for a specific file

actions.name: download_file
actions.description: Download file content as text or binary data
